body: Laws & Policies       Firearms Policy At The Jimmy Carter National Historic Site As of February 22, 2010, a new federal law allows people who can legally possess firearms under applicable federal, state, and local laws, to legally possess firearms in this park.           Superintendent's Compendium The Superintendent's Compendium is a summary of designations, closures, permit requirements and other restrictions imposed under discretionary authority.
title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Laws & Policies
